name: Infinity  - Hummingboard
description: Style to give a board or a folder a background in Infinity.
additional_info:
This will style every single board exactly the same however here are Instructions to change each individual Folder or Board:

For each individual board copy and repeat this code and  make sure 
to add this [rootid=''] with the unique rootid from url for that board before all selectors  
ie: appstartinfinity/b/'.....'/xyz

- Place it before the css selectors
for example: [rootid='2brHO6i142F'] div .scrollable-x { 
- Then replace your image url in each section
- Ignore stylish warnings for adjoing classes

For individual Folders do the same but with [folderid=''] with the second id code.

Updates: 
- added tweak for narrower columns as generic columns seem to wide and there is no option yet like in notion to set this.
- Fixed scrolling issue on table and list
